# RM_geNODErator
    
![license](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-The Unlicense-blue)
A ReadMe generator that uses node.js and inquirer

# Installation
Clone the repo, run npm install and node index
# Usage 
Creating a professional ReadME for a repo
